title: Performance of control mice in the heterogenous sequence task
description: Male control mice (VAChTflox/flox) were evaluated at 5-8 months of age using the Heterogeneous Sequence Task to assess response chain learning and complex motor learning.

affiliations.name: Robarts Research Institute, The University of Western Ontario

primaryPublications.title: Evaluating Sequential Response Learning in the Rodent Operant Touchscreen System
